issue.title: [CF 1230] Request: Check last spell cast for ww monk mastery
issue.body:
Thank you for working on this addon. I love it so much!

I was wondering if you have plans to add a condition to check last spell cast by player so that I can use tmw with my windwalker monk in Legion. The new ww mastery gives bonus dps so long as you don't use the same ability twice in a row. I'd love to be able to account for that in tmw.

Thanks for your time.


> Posted by CurseForge user heathmilo | Imported from CurseForge issue #1230 | Raw
